languages.text: {n}Когда ваши пальцы касаются жесткого оперения, {petname} издает леденящий душу клекот. Кажется, птица вот-вот попытается вцепиться в вас когтями... но под повелительным взглядом хозяина орел смиряет свою кровожадность.{/n}

{n}As your fingers brush against the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its talons into you... but then, under its master's commanding gaze, it quells its bloodlust.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда ваши пальцы касаются жесткого оперения, {petname} издает леденящий душу клекот. Кажется, птица вот-вот попытается вцепиться в вас когтями... но под повелительным взглядом хозяина орел смиряет свою кровожадность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As your fingers touch the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its claws into you... but then it quells its bloodlust under its master's commanding gaze.{/n}

{n}As your fingers touch the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its claws into you... but then it quells its bloodlust under its master's commanding gaze.{/n}

{n}As your fingers brush against the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its talons into you... but then, under its master's commanding gaze, it quells its bloodlust.{/n}

{n}As your fingers brush against the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its talons into you... but then, under its master's commanding gaze, it quells its bloodlust.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの指が粗い羽に触れた途端、{petname}はぞっとするような悲鳴を上げた。鳥が今にも鉤爪をあなたに突き立てそうな気配を感じた…だが、主人の威圧的な視線を受けて、その血に飢えた衝動を抑え込んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As your fingers brush against the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its talons into you... but then, under its master's commanding gaze, it quells its bloodlust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの指が粗い羽に触れた途端、{petname}はぞっとするような悲鳴を上げた。鳥が今にも鉤爪をあなたに突き立てそうな気配を感じた…だが、主人の威圧的な視線を受けて、その血に飢えた衝動を抑え込んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als deine Finger die rauen Federn berühren, kreischt {petname} furchterregend. Du hast das Gefühl, als würde der Vogel gleich seine Krallen in dir versenken ... doch unter dem befehlenden Blick {mf|seines Herren|seiner Herrin} unterdrückt er seine Blutgier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As your fingers brush against the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its talons into you... but then, under its master's commanding gaze, it quells its bloodlust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als deine Finger die rauen Federn berühren, kreischt {petname} furchterregend. Du hast das Gefühl, als würde der Vogel gleich seine Krallen in dir versenken ... doch unter dem befehlenden Blick {mf|seines Herren|seiner Herrin} unterdrückt er seine Blutgier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tandis que vos doigts effleurent ses plumes rêches, {petname} émet un cri strident. Vous sentez que l'aigle est sur le point de planter ses serres dans votre poignet... mais en croisant votre regard autoritaire, l'oiseau parvient à maîtriser sa soif de sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As your fingers brush against the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its talons into you... but then, under its master's commanding gaze, it quells its bloodlust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tandis que vos doigts effleurent ses plumes rêches, {petname} émet un cri strident. Vous sentez que l'aigle est sur le point de planter ses serres dans votre poignet... mais en croisant votre regard autoritaire, l'oiseau parvient à maîtriser sa soif de sang.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando pasas los dedos por su áspero plumaje, {petname} profiere un chillido escalofriante. Sientes como si el pájaro estuviese a punto de clavarte las garras... pero entonces, bajo la imperiosa mirada de su {mf|amo|ama}, el ave reprime su sed de sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As your fingers brush against the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its talons into you... but then, under its master's commanding gaze, it quells its bloodlust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando pasas los dedos por su áspero plumaje, {petname} profiere un chillido escalofriante. Sientes como si el pájaro estuviese a punto de clavarte las garras... pero entonces, bajo la imperiosa mirada de su {mf|amo|ama}, el ave reprime su sed de sangre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你的手指抚摸着{petname}粗糙的羽毛时，它发出了令人毛骨悚然的尖叫声。你感觉到，这只猎鹰仿佛想把利爪刺入你的身体……但随后，在你威严的注视之下，它克制住了对鲜血的渴望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As your fingers brush against the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its talons into you... but then, under its master's commanding gaze, it quells its bloodlust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你的手指抚摸着{petname}粗糙的羽毛时，它发出了令人毛骨悚然的尖叫声。你感觉到，这只猎鹰仿佛想把利爪刺入你的身体……但随后，在你威严的注视之下，它克制住了对鲜血的渴望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parmakların kuşun sert tüylerine değdiği an {petname} keskin bir feryat koparıyor. Her an pençelerini sana geçirecek sanıyorsun. Fakat efendisinin buyurgan bakışlarıyla kendisini dizginliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As your fingers brush against the rough feathers, {petname} lets out a chilling screech. You feel as if the bird is about to sink its talons into you... but then, under its master's commanding gaze, it quells its bloodlust.{/n}
